description: Eggplant halves filled with a simple lentil mix, shake up your weekly dinner rotation with this flavour-packed Mediterranean dish.
name: Mediterranean Stuffed Eggplant Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups Woolworths Greek style yoghurt light
1.5 cups Woolworths light tasty shredded cheese

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine cheese and breadcrumbs. Remove eggplant shells from oven and fill with lentil mix. Firmly press crumbs over eggplant halves. Bake for a further 15 minutes or until golden. To serve, top each eggplant with yoghurt and sprinkle over remaining parsley.

In a small bowl, combine cheese and breadcrumbs. Remove eggplant shells from oven and fill with lentil mix. Firmly press crumbs over eggplant halves. Bake for a further 15 minutes or until golden. To serve, top each eggplant with yoghurt and sprinkle over remaining parsley.
